channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Przeblysk

item.title: git commit husky npx not found
item.description: 基本上的表现为 xx command not found 例如 npx command not found. yarn command not found. 解决办法 在用户根目录新建.huskyrc 将环境写入其中，例如 nvm 安装的 node 环境 export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm" [ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && \. "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" # This loads

item.title: Unable to resolve your shell environment in a reasonable time. Please review your shell configuration.
item.description: 问题表现为启动vscode的时候右下角会有一个提示Unable to resolve your shell environment in a reasonable time. Please review your shell configuration. 在GitHub上有同样的issue被提出：Unab
